name: EQ2 Forums - Default skin alternate 1
description:
This is an alternate stylesheet for the "Default" skin on the EverQuest II official forums located at http://forums.station.sony.com/eq2/.  I utilized colors from the header graphic to make a more harmonious color palette than the original stylesheet.

If you enjoy using this style, please take a moment to rate, comment, and/or donate.  :)
